text: w'idha wjb aleadhab elyhm; ltmadyhm fi almeasy waltghyan, w'ieradhm ean sharae allah whkmh, hataa saru min shrar khlqh, 'akhrajna lahum min al'ard fi akhir alzman elamt min ealamat alssaeat alkbra, wahi "aldab", thdthhm 'ana alnaas almnkryn llbeth kanuu bialquran wamuhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam wadinih la yusadiqun wala yemlwn
